title: Georgii Frid. Stieberi Spirensis Historia Theologiæ Dogmaticæ Lutheri & Melanchthonis
creator: Stieberus, Georgius Fridericus
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Stieberus, Georgius Fridericus: Georgii Frid. Stieberi Spirensis Historia Theologiæ Dogmaticæ Lutheri & Melanchthonis  opera Restauratæ, qua integra exhibetur de huius Locis Theologicis Historica Commentatio Historiæ Arnoldinæ ac profanis Indifferentistarum ingeniis opposita. Gustrovii  Leipzig  Waldenburgi  Berlin 1719
